root.name: get()

example.code:
v1 = None v2 = None
def setup(): size(100, 100) v1 = PVector(20.0, 30.0, 40.0) v2 = PVector() v2 = v1.get() println(v2.x) # Prints "20.0" println(v2.y) # Prints "30.0" println(v2.z) # Prints "40.0"

root.description: Gets a copy of the vector, returns a PVector object.
